Author: brianmckenzie
Content: YC will probably see through that, unless your faux-founder has a CS degree from one of the top departments, or some equally amazing credential. You might just apply and stipulate that you're looking for a co-founder, rather than go with an impostor.

Author: wammin
Content: searching GoDaddy for a good domain, we stumbled on wamily.com and it was available and so perfect. Wamily = "Web Family". The choice of the name actually helped us shape the product.

Content: It's not a start-up anymore when you start hiring people for salary with no equity.

Author: brianmckenzie
Content:
I consider it morally wrong to pay domain squatters. Will never, ever do it. Like squeegee men or street vagrants, the way to make them go away is not to pay them.

Just get creative - there are tons of usable domains still available.
